arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | OGC Nice 2-0 Montpellier: Le Gym bolster Champions League hopes, MHSC’s relegation fears worsen
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 23, 23/02/25 OGC Nice registered their third win on the bounce as they dispatched relegation-threatened Montpellier HSC at a canter (2-0) to retake their place on…

arts.ttl: Nice predicted XI v Montpellier: Melvin Bard out, Evann Guessand to start
arts.sum: OGC Nice have no fresh injury concerns but will have to do without wing-back Melvin Bard when they come up against Montpellier HSC on Sunday afternoon. The Frenchman is suspended…

arts.ttl: Club Brugge star confident they’re not at disadvantage in Aston Villa tie – Hoping for nice bonus instead
arts.sum: Club Brugge star Joaquin Seys has insisted being drawn at home first in their Champions League tie with Aston Villa will not leave them at a disadvantage. Voetbal Nieuws cover comments from Seys today after the Champions League draw paired Brugge up with Aston Villa on Friday. arts.ttl: Preview: Nice vs. Montpellier HSC - prediction, team news, lineups
